description: This API is in preview release for Amazon Connect and is subject to change. Returns the current state of the specified instance identifier. It tracks the instance while it is being created and returns an error status, if applicable. If an instance is not created successfully, the instance status reason field returns details relevant to the reason. The instance in a failed state is returned only for 24 hours after the CreateInstance API was invoked.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance. You can find the instance ID in the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance.

nested_items.name: IdentityManagementType
nested_items.description: The identity management type.

nested_items.name: InstanceAlias
nested_items.description: The alias of instance.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: When the instance was created.

nested_items.name: ServiceRole
nested_items.description: The service role of the instance.

nested_items.name: InstanceStatus
nested_items.description: The state of the instance.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Relevant details why the instance was not successfully created.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: The message.

nested_items.name: InboundCallsEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether inbound calls are enabled.

nested_items.name: OutboundCallsEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether outbound calls are enabled.

nested_items.name: InstanceAccessUrl
nested_items.description: This URL allows contact center users to access the Amazon Connect admin website.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfiguration
nested_items.description: Status information about the replication process. This field is included only when you are using the ReplicateInstance API to replicate an Amazon Connect instance across Amazon Web Services Regions. For information about replicating Amazon Connect instances, see Create a replica of your existing Amazon Connect instance in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.

nested_items.name: ReplicationStatusSummaryList
nested_items.description: A list of replication status summaries. The summaries contain details about the replication of configuration information for Amazon Connect resources, for each Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: Region
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region. This can be either the source or the replica Region, depending where it appears in the summary list.

nested_items.name: ReplicationStatus
nested_items.description: The state of the replication.

nested_items.name: ReplicationStatusReason
nested_items.description: A description of the replication status. Use this information to resolve any issues that are preventing the successful replication of your Amazon Connect instance to another Region.

nested_items.name: SourceRegion
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the source Amazon Connect instance was created. This is the Region where the ReplicateInstance API was called to start the replication process.

nested_items.name: GlobalSignInEndpoint
nested_items.description: The URL that is used to sign-in to your Amazon Connect instance according to your traffic distribution group configuration. For more information about sign-in and traffic distribution groups, see Important things to know in the Create traffic distribution groups topic in the Amazon Connect Administrator Guide.
